About the Company: Vyapar Industries Ltd is one of the largest manufacturer, wholesaler and exporter of quality viscose rayon yarns, embroidery yarns, fabrics & other accessories.The company specializes in embroidery threads, sewing threads and other yarns. They also have an impressive array of tailoring accessories meant specifically for the export market.The product range of the company includes Rayon embroidery threads,Polyester embroidery threads,Viscose rayon filament yarn,Polyester filament yarn,Pure silk yarn,Nylon filament yarn,Spun polyester and core spun polyester threads and Miscellaneous products like lighters, balloons etc. are imported under the Vyapar brand & thereafter sold in the local & export market after necessary repacking & printing.
